Subjects exclude participate study : 1. female pregnant lactate [ must use acceptable method birth control child bear potential ] . * 2. exhibit visible symptom skin disease , psoriasis eczema , skin abnormality ( include active dermal lesion , uneven skin tone scar ) might interfere interpretation study result . The presence nevus , blemish , mole acceptable , Investigator 's judgement , interfere study result skin strip procedure . 3. history allergic response sunscreens product similar include study . 4. dry scaly skin test site . 5. diabetes . 6. history abnormal response sunlight , phototoxic photoallergic response . 7. exist sunburn suntan , tan booth would interfere interpretation study result . 8. use self tanner within past two week . 9. excessive hair test site area could , opinion investigator , interfere interpretation result . 10. participate research drug trial patch test within six week begin study . 11. known sensitivity Scotch 600 Transparent Tape . 12. currently receive , within past two week receive , topical systemic medication could , opinion investigator , interfere interpretation result , affect safety subject , may change body 's response ultraviolet light . 13. currently take drug list next page . In addition , use St. John 's Wort similar dietary supplement , aspirin OTC ibuprofen contraindicate duration study . Low dose daily aspirin use , 81 mg , take heart attack prevention exclude . Acceptable method birth control use course study : oral contraceptive pill , intrauterine device , patch , injection , condom spermicide , partner vasectomy , bilateral tubal ligation , abstinence evidence non childbearing potential ( i.e. , postmenopausal [ one year without menstrual period ] , hysterectomy bilateral ovariectomy ) .
